name: slow_network_simulator
description: Generates artificial delay patterns and loading behaviors to simulate dial-up internet and slow IE6 browsing experience. Provides timing configurations for page loads, image rendering, and network requests.

action_type.description: Type of action to slow down

intensity.description: How slow the simulation should be

include_progress.description: Whether to include retro progress bar/indicator

stutter_intervals.description: Array of pause points during loading (in ms)

progress_messages.description: Spooky status messages to show during loading

implementation_code.description: JavaScript/TypeScript code snippet for implementing the delay

visual_effects.description: Suggested visual effects during loading (progress bar, hourglass cursor, etc.)

output.implementation_code: const simulateSlowLoad = async () => { await delay(2000); updateProgress(33); await delay(1200); updateProgress(66); await delay(800); updateProgress(99); await delay(500); };
